objects.text:
• Two versatile washes: Light & Deep indigo
• High-quality denim with fade-resistant technology
• Modern slim-fit design with perfect stretch
• Timeless style for casual & semi-formal wear

product_details.name: Premium Denim Collection: Classic Comfort Meets Modern Style
product_details.description:
• Two versatile washes: Light fade and Deep indigo blue options
• High-quality denim material for superior durability and comfort
• Modern slim-fit design that flatters any body type
• Expertly crafted with fade-resistant technology
• Five-pocket classic styling for practicality
• Perfect stretch comfort for all-day wear
• Available in multiple sizes to ensure the perfect fit
• Timeless design suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions
• Easy-care fabric that maintains shape after washing
• Sustainable manufacturing process with eco-friendly materials

banner_details:
This square promotional banner features a premium fashion product display with a clean, modern layout. The background presents soft, gradient beige tones with decorative wavy borders enhancing visual structure. It includes a bold heading (`heading`) with a sans-serif font in deep navy blue, paired with an elegant serif subheading (`subheading`) for stylistic contrast. A thin teal underline (`decorative`) separates the text from the product highlights section (`description`), which outlines key features in bullet format. Centered at the bottom are a large price (`price`) and a contrasting dark blue call-to-action button labeled `SHOP NOW` (`cta`, `cta_background`). Two hanging jeans are displayed through an embedded image (`product_image`), creating product focus and symmetry.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A2E4C
- Muted Blue: #3D5A80
- Light Gradient Beige: #F5F1ED to #EBE5DC
- Accent Blue: #A5C4D4
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases two pairs of jeans in contrasting denim shades—light blue and dark blue—hung on warm wooden hangers. The color palette suggests a harmonious yet striking visual contrast: soft sky blue (#A7C8D1), vintage denim blue (#395B77), faded indigo (#214058), warm natural wood (#B98042), and neutral white (#F4F4F4) from the background. The blending is subtle in denim textures through natural wear gradients and distress effects, adding depth and realism. The wooden hangers provide a warm touch that highlights the cool denim tones. This palette balances vibrancy and subtlety, ideal for a stylish, modern advertising banner.
